key.name: disabled-apps
key.description: List of app IDs to hide from the tray. Apps in this list will not show tray icons even when running.

key.name: icon-mode
key.description: How to display tray icons. 'symbolic' converts icons to monochrome to match the panel style. 'original' shows the app's original colored icons.

key.name: app-order
key.description: Custom ordering of tray items by app ID. Apps not in this list appear in discovery order.

key.name: icon-overrides
key.description: Map of app IDs to custom icon names or file paths. When set, these override the app-provided icon.

key.name: icon-effect-overrides
key.description: Map of app IDs to JSON-encoded effect parameters. Each value is a JSON object with: desaturation (0-1), brightness (-1 to 1), contrast (0-2), useTint (boolean), tintColor ([r,g,b] 0-1 each).

key.name: icon-fallback-overrides
key.description: List of app IDs whose icon overrides are only used when the app sends a pixbuf or no icon.
